{{cpp/ranges/enumerate_view/iterator/title|operator[]}}
{{cpp/ranges/enumerate_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr auto operator[]( difference_type n ) const
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;
}}

Returns an element at specified relative location.
Equivalent to: &lt;!-- return reference-type(pos_ + n, current_[n]); --&gt;
{{box|{{c/core|return}}{{tt|{{nbsp}}}}{{rlpt|/#Member types|''reference-type''}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpt|/#Data members|''pos_''}}{{tt|{{nbsp}}}}{{c/core|+ n,}}{{tt|{{nbsp}}}}{{rlpt|/#Data members|''current_''}}{{c/core|[n]);}}}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|position relative to current location}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The element at displacement {{c|n}} relative to the current location.
